```{r}
data = import(here("data", "rstats_tweets.rds"), setclass = "tb_df") %>% 
  characterize() %>% 
  clean_names()

names(data)
head(data, 3)

```

```{r}
data %>% 
  select(screen_name) %>%
  group_by(screen_name) %>% 
  count() %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  data_frame() %>% 
  slice(1:25) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(screen_name), y = n))+
  geom_bar(stat = "identity")+
  coord_flip()
```


```{r}
#Fig2
data <- data %>%
  mutate(month = round_date(data$created_at, # adding month variable
                            unit = "month"))
data <- data %>% 
  group_by(month) %>% 
  mutate(n = n()) # create count variable

data %>% 
  select(month, n) # taking a look
  
```
